meanings.definition: An imaginary line drawn around the Earth equally distant from both poles, dividing the Earth into northern and southern hemispheres.
meanings.sent1: The equator is like a belt around the middle of the Earth.
meanings.sent2: Ships often sail near the equator to enjoy the warm weather.
meanings.sent3: When the equator gets tired of being in the middle, it takes a break at the North Pole.
meanings.sent4: The equator is the ultimate divider between the top and bottom of the Earth.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the equator as a giant ribbon wrapping around the globe.
